fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: CFP reform implementation; the discard ban; the control regulation; various fish species management plans (eels, sea bass, salmon, cod, tuna..); Marine Strategy Framework Directive, Water Framework Directive, EU 2020 Biodiversity Strategy; EU Invasive Alien Species Regulation implementation; the evaluation of the Birds- and Habitats Directives / Natura 2000; the impact by hydropower on the aquatic environment, socio-economic value of recreational fishing, BLUE GROWTH strategy...
relevant_communication:
Involved with the "Forum on Recreational Fisheries and Aquatic Environment", which secretariat is provided by the European Anglers Alliance and the European Fishing Tackle Trade Association 
Website: www.eaa-europe.org/european-parliament-forum
customers: European Anglers Alliance# European Fishng Tackle Trade Association
goals__remit: To provide advice and attend meetings concerning preparation of EU policies and legislation as well as the implementation of legislation, control and enforcement - in particular with regard to EU fisheries and environmental issues as well as animal welfare (fish). Special in depth knowledge about recreational fisheries - Europe and globally. Contracted by the European Anglers Alliance and the European Fishing Tackle Trade Association since September 2001 until today.
